Param.Description: Customer Name need to work with Vendor

Param.Name: sEditVendor
Param.Description: Vendor Name or Vendor Number that will be inputed to search field

Param.Name: sEnrollmentType
Param.Description: Enrollment Type need to change or Resend for Resend Enrollment

Param.Name: sIsSendMail
Param.Description: If you want to Send Email, set to True, False for Cancel or null for bypasss

Param.Name: sEmailToSend
Param.Description: The Email you want to send Enrollment to. null for bypasss

Param.Name: sExpectedToastMessage
Param.Description: The message you want to validate

Param.Name: isReset
Param.Description: If you want to Reset Enrollment then set to True

Param.Name: sExpectedEnrolledStatus
Param.Description: Expected Enrollment status need to validate

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: If you want to Save the change then put Save, Apply or Cancel

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Name: CheckEmail365UserCreationResetPassword
Keyword.Description: Check Email in Inbox, Verify Email exist or not in Inbox base on From and Title, then verify content of that email (Images\WebMail\Home\3.png)

Param.Name: sFrom
Param.Description: Email From need to verify by exactly, null means by pass verify by From

Param.Name: sTitle
Param.Description: Title of Email need to confirmed, null means by pass verify Title

Param.Name: sExpectedNumberOfEmail
Param.Description: Expected number of email found base on inputted sFrom and sTitle, support compare >, null by pass verify it

Param.Name: sOpenEmailNumber
Param.Description: Click on email number found base on sFrom and sTitle, null means by pass open email

Param.Name: sContent1
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sContent2
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sResetLink
Param.Description: This is hyperlink for resetpasword, just give the prefix included Env's URL

Param.Name: sIsClick
Param.Description: If you want to click to reset Link

Param.Name: sExpectedWelcomeMessage
Param.Description: Welcome Message need to Validate

Param.Name: isClickLetBegin
Param.Description: If you want to process with Let Begin button then set it [True]

Param.Name: sEnrollmentType
Param.Description: The Type of Enrollment you want to do Enroll

Param.Name: sPrimaryEmail
Param.Description: The Primary Email you want to use for enrollment

Param.Name: sOptionalEmail
Param.Description: The Optional Email you want to use for enrollment,Separate optional e-mails with semi-colon

Param.Name: sBankName
Param.Description: The Name of Bank you want to setup with ACH Information

Param.Name: sAccountType
Param.Description: The Type of account ACH

Param.Name: sRoutingNumber
Param.Description: Routing Number, Must be 9 digits

Param.Name: sAccountNumber
Param.Description: Account Number, less than 17 digits

Param.Name: isEditCompanyInfor
Param.Description: If you want to Edit Company Information then set it [true], otherwise is [false] or [null]

Param.Name: isUsingSameMainAddress
Param.Description: If you want Remit Address using same address as Main Address then set it [true], otherwise is [false] or [null]

Param.Name: sMainAddressMetaData
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill Address Information, must be 10 values and separate by semicolon [;] MainCountry;AddressLine1;AddresssLine2;AddresssLine3;City;State/Provice;Zipcode;ContactName;ContactTitle;ContactEmail

Param.Name: sMainPhone
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill sMainPhone Information, must be 3 values and separate by semicolon [;] CountryCode;PhoneNumber;Extension

Param.Name: sRemitAddressMetaData
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill Address Information, must be 10 values and separate by semicolon [;] MainCountry;AddressLine1;AddresssLine2;AddresssLine3;City;State/Provice;Zipcode;ContactName;ContactTitle;ContactEmail

Param.Name: sRemitPhone
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill sMainPhone Information, must be 3 values and separate by semicolon [;] CountryCode;PhoneNumber;Extension

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: Nothing here

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Name: LoginEmail365
Keyword.Description: Login To Webmail (Images\WebMail\Login\2.png)

Param.Name: sUserName
Param.Description: User Name

Keyword.Name: CheckEmail365UserCreationResetPassword
Keyword.Description: Check Email in Inbox, Verify Email exist or not in Inbox base on From and Title, then verify content of that email (Images\WebMail\Home\3.png)

Param.Name: sFrom
Param.Description: Email From need to verify by exactly, null means by pass verify by From

Param.Name: sTitle
Param.Description: Title of Email need to confirmed, null means by pass verify Title

Param.Name: sExpectedNumberOfEmail
Param.Description: Expected number of email found base on inputted sFrom and sTitle, support compare >, null by pass verify it

Param.Name: sOpenEmailNumber
Param.Description: Click on email number found base on sFrom and sTitle, null means by pass open email

Param.Name: sContent1
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sContent2
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sResetLink
Param.Description: This is hyperlink for resetpasword, just give the prefix included Env's URL

Param.Name: sIsClick
Param.Description: If you want to click to reset Link

Param.Name: sExpectedWelcomeMessage
Param.Description: Welcome Message need to Validate

Param.Name: isClickLetBegin
Param.Description: If you want to process with Let Begin button then set it [True]

Param.Name: sEnrollmentType
Param.Description: The Type of Enrollment you want to do Enroll

Param.Name: sPrimaryEmail
Param.Description: The Primary Email you want to use for enrollment

Param.Name: sOptionalEmail
Param.Description: The Optional Email you want to use for enrollment,Separate optional e-mails with semi-colon

Param.Name: sBankName
Param.Description: The Name of Bank you want to setup with ACH Information

Param.Name: sAccountType
Param.Description: The Type of account ACH

Param.Name: sRoutingNumber
Param.Description: Routing Number, Must be 9 digits

Param.Name: sAccountNumber
Param.Description: Account Number, less than 17 digits

Param.Name: isEditCompanyInfor
Param.Description: If you want to Edit Company Information then set it [true], othewise is [false] or [null]

Param.Name: isUsingSameMainAddress
Param.Description: If you want Remit Address using same adresss as Main Address then set it [true], othewise is [false] or [null]

Param.Name: sMainAddressMetaData
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill Address Information, must be 10 values and separate by semicolon [;] MainCountry;AddressLine1;AddresssLine2;AddresssLine3;City;State/Provice;Zipcode;ContactName;ContactTitle;ContactEmail

Param.Name: sMainPhone
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill sMainPhone Information, must be 3 values and separate by semicolon [;] CountryCode;PhoneNumber;Extension

Param.Name: sRemitAddressMetaData
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill Address Information, must be 10 values and separate by semicolon [;] MainCountry;AddressLine1;AddresssLine2;AddresssLine3;City;State/Provice;Zipcode;ContactName;ContactTitle;ContactEmail

Param.Name: sRemitPhone
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill sMainPhone Information, must be 3 values and separate by semicolon [;] CountryCode;PhoneNumber;Extension

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: Nothing here

Param.Name: sMainPhone
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill sMainPhone Information, must be 3 values and separate by semicolon [;] CountryCode;PhoneNumber;Extension

Param.Name: sRemitAddressMetaData
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill Address Information, must be 10 values and separate by semicolon [;] MainCountry;AddressLine1;AddresssLine2;AddresssLine3;City;State/Provice;Zipcode;ContactName;ContactTitle;ContactEmail

Param.Name: sRemitPhone
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill sMainPhone Information, must be 3 values and separate by semicolon [;] CountryCode;PhoneNumber;Extension

Param.Description: Nothing here

Keyword.Name: CheckEmail365UserCreationResetPassword
Keyword.Description: Check Email in Inbox, Verify Email exist or not in Inbox base on From and Title, then verify content of that email (Images\WebMail\Home\3.png)

Param.Name: sFrom
Param.Description: Email From need to verify by exactly, null means by pass verify by From

Param.Name: sTitle
Param.Description: Title of Email need to confirmed, null means by pass verify Title

Param.Name: sExpectedNumberOfEmail
Param.Description: Expected number of email found base on inputted sFrom and sTitle, support compare >, null by pass verify it

Param.Name: sOpenEmailNumber
Param.Description: Click on email number found base on sFrom and sTitle, null means by pass open email

Param.Name: sContent1
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sContent2
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sResetLink
Param.Description: This is hyperlink for resetpasword, just give the prefix included Env's URL

Param.Name: sIsClick
Param.Description: If you want to click to reset Link

Param.Name: sExpectedWelcomeMessage
Param.Description: Welcome Message need to Validate

Param.Name: isClickLetBegin
Param.Description: If you want to process with Let Begin button then set it [True]

Param.Name: sEnrollmentType
Param.Description: The Type of Enrollment you want to do Enroll

Param.Name: sPrimaryEmail
Param.Description: The Primary Email you want to use for enrollment

Param.Name: sOptionalEmail
Param.Description: The Optional Email you want to use for enrollment,Separate optional e-mails with semi-colon

Param.Name: sBankName
Param.Description: The Name of Bank you want to setup with ACH Information

Param.Name: sAccountType
Param.Description: The Type of account ACH

Param.Name: sRoutingNumber
Param.Description: Routing Number, Must be 9 digits

Param.Name: sAccountNumber
Param.Description: Account Number, less than 17 digits

Param.Name: isEditCompanyInfor
Param.Description: If you want to Edit Company Information then set it [true], othewise is [false] or [null]

Param.Name: isUsingSameMainAddress
Param.Description: If you want Remit Address using same adresss as Main Address then set it [true], othewise is [false] or [null]

Param.Name: sMainAddressMetaData
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill Address Information, must be 10 values and separate by semicolon [;] MainCountry;AddressLine1;AddresssLine2;AddresssLine3;City;State/Provice;Zipcode;ContactName;ContactTitle;ContactEmail

Param.Name: sMainPhone
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill sMainPhone Information, must be 3 values and separate by semicolon [;] CountryCode;PhoneNumber;Extension

Param.Name: sRemitAddressMetaData
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill Address Information, must be 10 values and separate by semicolon [;] MainCountry;AddressLine1;AddresssLine2;AddresssLine3;City;State/Provice;Zipcode;ContactName;ContactTitle;ContactEmail

Param.Name: sRemitPhone
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill sMainPhone Information, must be 3 values and separate by semicolon [;] CountryCode;PhoneNumber;Extension

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: Nothing here

Keyword.Description: VCO Enrollment Process(Images\AdminDev\Operations\1.png)

Param.Name: sCustomerName
Param.Description: Customer Name need to work with Vendor

Param.Name: sEditVendor
Param.Description: Vendor Name or Vendor Number that will be inputed to search field

Param.Name: sEnrollmentType
Param.Description: Enrollment Type need to change or Resend for Resend Enrollment

Param.Name: sIsSendMail
Param.Description: If you want to Send Email, set to True, False for Cancel or null for bypasss

Param.Name: sEmailToSend
Param.Description: The Email you want to send Enrollment to. null for bypasss

Param.Name: sExpectedToastMessage
Param.Description: The message you want to validate

Param.Name: isReset
Param.Description: If you want to Reset Enrollment then set to True

Param.Name: sExpectedEnrolledStatus
Param.Description: Expected Enrollment status need to validate

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: If you want to Save the change then put Save, Apply or Cancel

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Description: Login To Webmail (Images\WebMail\Login\2.png)

Param.Name: sUserName
Param.Description: User Name

Keyword.Name: CheckEmail365UserCreationResetPassword
Keyword.Description: Check Email in Inbox, Verify Email exist or not in Inbox base on From and Title, then verify content of that email (Images\WebMail\Home\3.png)

Param.Name: sFrom
Param.Description: Email From need to verify by exactly, null means by pass verify by From

Param.Name: sTitle
Param.Description: Title of Email need to confirmed, null means by pass verify Title

Param.Name: sExpectedNumberOfEmail
Param.Description: Expected number of email found base on inputted sFrom and sTitle, support compare >, null by pass verify it

Param.Name: sOpenEmailNumber
Param.Description: Click on email number found base on sFrom and sTitle, null means by pass open email

Param.Name: sContent1
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sContent2
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sResetLink
Param.Description: This is hyperlink for resetpasword, just give the prefix included Env's URL

Param.Name: sIsClick
Param.Description: If you want to click to reset Link

Param.Name: sExpectedWelcomeMessage
Param.Description: Welcome Message need to Validate

Param.Name: isClickLetBegin
Param.Description: If you want to process with Let Begin button then set it [True]

Param.Name: sEnrollmentType
Param.Description: The Type of Enrollment you want to do Enroll

Param.Name: sPrimaryEmail
Param.Description: The Primary Email you want to use for enrollment

Param.Name: sOptionalEmail
Param.Description: The Optional Email you want to use for enrollment,Separate optional e-mails with semi-colon

Param.Name: sBankName
Param.Description: The Name of Bank you want to setup with ACH Information

Param.Name: sAccountType
Param.Description: The Type of account ACH

Param.Name: sRoutingNumber
Param.Description: Routing Number, Must be 9 digits

Param.Name: sAccountNumber
Param.Description: Account Number, less than 17 digits

Param.Name: isEditCompanyInfor
Param.Description: If you want to Edit Company Information then set it [true], otherwise is [false] or [null]

Param.Name: isUsingSameMainAddress
Param.Description: If you want Remit Address using same address as Main Address then set it [true], otherwise is [false] or [null]

Param.Name: sMainAddressMetaData
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill Address Information, must be 10 values and separate by semicolon [;] MainCountry;AddressLine1;AddresssLine2;AddresssLine3;City;State/Provice;Zipcode;ContactName;ContactTitle;ContactEmail

Param.Name: sMainPhone
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill sMainPhone Information, must be 3 values and separate by semicolon [;] CountryCode;PhoneNumber;Extension

Param.Name: sRemitAddressMetaData
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill Address Information, must be 10 values and separate by semicolon [;] MainCountry;AddressLine1;AddresssLine2;AddresssLine3;City;State/Provice;Zipcode;ContactName;ContactTitle;ContactEmail

Param.Name: sRemitPhone
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill sMainPhone Information, must be 3 values and separate by semicolon [;] CountryCode;PhoneNumber;Extension

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: Nothing here

Keyword.Name: LoginEmail365
Keyword.Description: Login To Webmail (Images\WebMail\Login\2.png)

Param.Name: sUserName
Param.Description: User Name

Keyword.Name: CheckEmail365UserCreationResetPassword
Keyword.Description: Check Email in Inbox, Verify Email exist or not in Inbox base on From and Title, then verify content of that email (Images\WebMail\Home\3.png)

Param.Name: sFrom
Param.Description: Email From need to verify by exactly, null means by pass verify by From

Param.Name: sTitle
Param.Description: Title of Email need to confirmed, null means by pass verify Title

Param.Name: sExpectedNumberOfEmail
Param.Description: Expected number of email found base on inputted sFrom and sTitle, support compare >, null by pass verify it

Param.Name: sOpenEmailNumber
Param.Description: Click on email number found base on sFrom and sTitle, null means by pass open email

Param.Name: sContent1
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sContent2
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sResetLink
Param.Description: This is hyperlink for resetpasword, just give the prefix included Env's URL

Param.Name: sIsClick
Param.Description: If you want to click to reset Link

Param.Name: sExpectedWelcomeMessage
Param.Description: Welcome Message need to Validate

Param.Name: isClickLetBegin
Param.Description: If you want to process with Let Begin button then set it [True]

Param.Name: sEnrollmentType
Param.Description: The Type of Enrollment you want to do Enroll

Param.Name: sPrimaryEmail
Param.Description: The Primary Email you want to use for enrollment

Param.Name: sOptionalEmail
Param.Description: The Optional Email you want to use for enrollment,Separate optional e-mails with semi-colon

Param.Name: sBankName
Param.Description: The Name of Bank you want to setup with ACH Information

Param.Name: sAccountType
Param.Description: The Type of account ACH

Param.Name: sRoutingNumber
Param.Description: Routing Number, Must be 9 digits

Param.Name: sAccountNumber
Param.Description: Account Number, less than 17 digits

Param.Name: isEditCompanyInfor
Param.Description: If you want to Edit Company Information then set it [true], othewise is [false] or [null]

Param.Name: isUsingSameMainAddress
Param.Description: If you want Remit Address using same adresss as Main Address then set it [true], othewise is [false] or [null]

Param.Name: sMainAddressMetaData
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill Address Information, must be 10 values and separate by semicolon [;] MainCountry;AddressLine1;AddresssLine2;AddresssLine3;City;State/Provice;Zipcode;ContactName;ContactTitle;ContactEmail

Param.Name: sMainPhone
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill sMainPhone Information, must be 3 values and separate by semicolon [;] CountryCode;PhoneNumber;Extension

Param.Name: sRemitAddressMetaData
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill Address Information, must be 10 values and separate by semicolon [;] MainCountry;AddressLine1;AddresssLine2;AddresssLine3;City;State/Provice;Zipcode;ContactName;ContactTitle;ContactEmail

Param.Name: sRemitPhone
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill sMainPhone Information, must be 3 values and separate by semicolon [;] CountryCode;PhoneNumber;Extension

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: Nothing here

Keyword.Name: VCOEnrollmentSendEmail
Keyword.Description: VCO Enrollment Process(Images\AdminDev\Operations\1.png)

Param.Name: sCustomerName
Param.Description: Customer Name need to work with Vendor

Param.Name: sEditVendor
Param.Description: Vendor Name or Vendor Number that will be inputed to search field

Param.Name: sEnrollmentType
Param.Description: Enrollment Type need to change or Resend for Resend Enrollment

Param.Name: sIsSendMail
Param.Description: If you want to Send Email, set to True, False for Cancel or null for bypasss

Param.Name: sEmailToSend
Param.Description: The Email you want to send Enrollment to. null for bypasss

Param.Name: sExpectedToastMessage
Param.Description: The message you want to validate

Param.Name: isReset
Param.Description: If you want to Reset Enrollment then set to True

Param.Name: sExpectedEnrolledStatus
Param.Description: Expected Enrollment status need to validate

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: If you want to Save the change then put Save, Apply or Cancel

Param.Description: The Email you want to send Enrollment to. null for bypasss

Param.Description: The message you want to validate

Param.Description: If you want to Reset Enrollment then set to True

Param.Description: Expected Enrollment status need to validate

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: If you want to Save the change then put Save, Apply or Cancel

Keyword.Name: CheckEmail365UserCreationResetPassword
Keyword.Description: Check Email in Inbox, Verify Email exist or not in Inbox base on From and Title, then verify content of that email (Images\WebMail\Home\3.png)

Param.Name: sFrom
Param.Description: Email From need to verify by exactly, null means by pass verify by From

Param.Name: sTitle
Param.Description: Title of Email need to confirmed, null means by pass verify Title

Param.Name: sExpectedNumberOfEmail
Param.Description: Expected number of email found base on inputted sFrom and sTitle, support compare >, null by pass verify it

Param.Name: sOpenEmailNumber
Param.Description: Click on email number found base on sFrom and sTitle, null means by pass open email

Param.Name: sContent1
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sContent2
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sResetLink
Param.Description: This is hyperlink for resetpasword, just give the prefix included Env's URL

Param.Name: sIsClick
Param.Description: If you want to click to reset Link

Param.Name: sExpectedWelcomeMessage
Param.Description: Welcome Message need to Validate

Param.Name: isClickLetBegin
Param.Description: If you want to process with Let Begin button then set it [True]

Param.Name: sEnrollmentType
Param.Description: The Type of Enrollment you want to do Enroll

Param.Name: sPrimaryEmail
Param.Description: The Primary Email you want to use for enrollment

Param.Name: sOptionalEmail
Param.Description: The Optional Email you want to use for enrollment,Separate optional e-mails with semi-colon

Param.Name: sBankName
Param.Description: The Name of Bank you want to setup with ACH Information

Param.Name: sAccountType
Param.Description: The Type of account ACH

Param.Name: sRoutingNumber
Param.Description: Routing Number, Must be 9 digits

Param.Name: sAccountNumber
Param.Description: Account Number, less than 17 digits

Param.Name: isEditCompanyInfor
Param.Description: If you want to Edit Company Information then set it [true], othewise is [false] or [null]

Param.Name: isUsingSameMainAddress
Param.Description: If you want Remit Address using same adresss as Main Address then set it [true], othewise is [false] or [null]

Param.Name: sMainAddressMetaData
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill Address Information, must be 10 values and separate by semicolon [;] MainCountry;AddressLine1;AddresssLine2;AddresssLine3;City;State/Provice;Zipcode;ContactName;ContactTitle;ContactEmail

Param.Name: sMainPhone
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill sMainPhone Information, must be 3 values and separate by semicolon [;] CountryCode;PhoneNumber;Extension

Param.Name: sRemitAddressMetaData
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill Address Information, must be 10 values and separate by semicolon [;] MainCountry;AddressLine1;AddresssLine2;AddresssLine3;City;State/Provice;Zipcode;ContactName;ContactTitle;ContactEmail

Keyword.Name: VCOEnrollmentSendEmail
Keyword.Description: VCO Enrollment Process(Images\AdminDev\Operations\1.png)

Param.Name: sCustomerName
Param.Description: Customer Name need to work with Vendor

Param.Name: sEditVendor
Param.Description: Vendor Name or Vendor Number that will be inputed to search field

Param.Name: sEnrollmentType
Param.Description: Enrollment Type need to change or Resend for Resend Enrollment

Param.Name: sIsSendMail
Param.Description: If you want to Send Email, set to True, False for Cancel or null for bypasss

Param.Name: sEmailToSend
Param.Description: The Email you want to send Enrollment to. null for bypasss

Param.Name: sExpectedToastMessage
Param.Description: The message you want to validate

Param.Name: isReset
Param.Description: If you want to Reset Enrollment then set to True

Param.Name: sExpectedEnrolledStatus
Param.Description: Expected Enrollment status need to validate

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: If you want to Save the change then put Save, Apply or Cancel

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Name: LaunchBrowser
Keyword.Description: Launch browser to URL

Param.Name: sURL
Param.Description: URL will be open

Param.Name: sVerifyTitle
Param.Description: Title need to verify by contains way, null means by pass verify it

Keyword.Name: LoginEmail365
Keyword.Description: Login To Webmail (Images\WebMail\Login\2.png)

Param.Name: sUserName
Param.Description: User Name

Keyword.Name: CheckEmail365UserCreationResetPassword
Keyword.Description: Check Email in Inbox, Verify Email exist or not in Inbox base on From and Title, then verify content of that email (Images\WebMail\Home\3.png)

Param.Name: sFrom
Param.Description: Email From need to verify by exactly, null means by pass verify by From

Param.Name: sTitle
Param.Description: Title of Email need to confirmed, null means by pass verify Title

Param.Name: sExpectedNumberOfEmail
Param.Description: Expected number of email found base on inputted sFrom and sTitle, support compare >, null by pass verify it

Param.Name: sOpenEmailNumber
Param.Description: Click on email number found base on sFrom and sTitle, null means by pass open email

Param.Name: sContent1
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sContent2
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sResetLink
Param.Description: This is hyperlink for resetpasword, just give the prefix included Env's URL

Param.Name: sIsClick
Param.Description: If you want to click to reset Link

Param.Name: sExpectedWelcomeMessage
Param.Description: Welcome Message need to Validate

Param.Name: isClickLetBegin
Param.Description: If you want to process with Let Begin button then set it [True]

Param.Name: sEnrollmentType
Param.Description: The Type of Enrollment you want to do Enroll

Param.Name: sPrimaryEmail
Param.Description: The Primary Email you want to use for enrollment

Param.Name: sOptionalEmail
Param.Description: The Optional Email you want to use for enrollment,Separate optional e-mails with semi-colon

Param.Name: sBankName
Param.Description: The Name of Bank you want to setup with ACH Information

Param.Name: sAccountType
Param.Description: The Type of account ACH

Param.Name: sRoutingNumber
Param.Description: Routing Number, Must be 9 digits

Param.Name: sAccountNumber
Param.Description: Account Number, less than 17 digits

Param.Name: isEditCompanyInfor
Param.Description: If you want to Edit Company Information then set it [true], otherwise is [false] or [null]

Param.Name: isUsingSameMainAddress
Param.Description: If you want Remit Address using same address as Main Address then set it [true], otherwise is [false] or [null]

Param.Name: sMainAddressMetaData
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill Address Information, must be 10 values and separate by semicolon [;] MainCountry;AddressLine1;AddresssLine2;AddresssLine3;City;State/Provice;Zipcode;ContactName;ContactTitle;ContactEmail

Param.Name: sMainPhone
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill sMainPhone Information, must be 3 values and separate by semicolon [;] CountryCode;PhoneNumber;Extension

Param.Name: sRemitAddressMetaData
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill Address Information, must be 10 values and separate by semicolon [;] MainCountry;AddressLine1;AddresssLine2;AddresssLine3;City;State/Provice;Zipcode;ContactName;ContactTitle;ContactEmail

Param.Name: sRemitPhone
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill sMainPhone Information, must be 3 values and separate by semicolon [;] CountryCode;PhoneNumber;Extension

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: Nothing here

Keyword.Description: Close browser

Keyword.Description: Check Email in Inbox, Verify Email exist or not in Inbox base on From and Title, then verify content of that email (Images\WebMail\Home\3.png)

Param.Name: sFrom
Param.Description: Email From need to verify by exactly, null means by pass verify by From

Param.Name: sTitle
Param.Description: Title of Email need to confirmed, null means by pass verify Title

Param.Name: sExpectedNumberOfEmail
Param.Description: Expected number of email found base on inputted sFrom and sTitle, support compare >, null by pass verify it

Param.Name: sOpenEmailNumber
Param.Description: Click on email number found base on sFrom and sTitle, null means by pass open email

Param.Name: sContent1
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sContent2
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sResetLink
Param.Description: This is hyperlink for resetpasword, just give the prefix included Env's URL

Param.Name: sIsClick
Param.Description: If you want to click to reset Link

Param.Name: sExpectedWelcomeMessage
Param.Description: Welcome Message need to Validate

Param.Name: isClickLetBegin
Param.Description: If you want to process with Let Begin button then set it [True]

Param.Name: sEnrollmentType
Param.Description: The Type of Enrollment you want to do Enroll

Param.Name: sPrimaryEmail
Param.Description: The Primary Email you want to use for enrollment

Param.Name: sOptionalEmail
Param.Description: The Optional Email you want to use for enrollment,Separate optional e-mails with semi-colon

Param.Name: sBankName
Param.Description: The Name of Bank you want to setup with ACH Information

Param.Name: sAccountType
Param.Description: The Type of account ACH

Param.Name: sRoutingNumber
Param.Description: Routing Number, Must be 9 digits

Param.Name: sAccountNumber
Param.Description: Account Number, less than 17 digits

Param.Name: isEditCompanyInfor
Param.Description: If you want to Edit Company Information then set it [true], otherwise is [false] or [null]

Param.Name: isUsingSameMainAddress
Param.Description: If you want Remit Address using same address as Main Address then set it [true], otherwise is [false] or [null]

Param.Name: sMainAddressMetaData
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill Address Information, must be 10 values and separate by semicolon [;] MainCountry;AddressLine1;AddresssLine2;AddresssLine3;City;State/Provice;Zipcode;ContactName;ContactTitle;ContactEmail

Param.Name: sMainPhone
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill sMainPhone Information, must be 3 values and separate by semicolon [;] CountryCode;PhoneNumber;Extension

Param.Name: sRemitAddressMetaData
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill Address Information, must be 10 values and separate by semicolon [;] MainCountry;AddressLine1;AddresssLine2;AddresssLine3;City;State/Provice;Zipcode;ContactName;ContactTitle;ContactEmail

Param.Name: sRemitPhone
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill sMainPhone Information, must be 3 values and separate by semicolon [;] CountryCode;PhoneNumber;Extension

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: Nothing here

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Param: Open Vendor Details and do Email Enrollment

Keyword.Name: VCOEnrollmentSendEmail
Keyword.Description: VCO Enrollment Process(Images\AdminDev\Operations\1.png)

Param.Name: sCustomerName
Param.Description: Customer Name need to work with Vendor

Param.Name: sEditVendor
Param.Description: Vendor Name or Vendor Number that will be inputed to search field

Param.Name: sEnrollmentType
Param.Description: Enrollment Type need to change or Resend for Resend Enrollment

Param.Name: sIsSendMail
Param.Description: If you want to Send Email, set to True, False for Cancel or null for bypasss

Param.Name: sEmailToSend
Param.Description: The Email you want to send Enrollment to. null for bypasss

Param.Name: sExpectedToastMessage
Param.Description: The message you want to validate

Param.Name: isReset
Param.Description: If you want to Reset Enrollment then set to True

Param.Name: sExpectedEnrolledStatus
Param.Description: Expected Enrollment status need to validate

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: If you want to Save the change then put Save, Apply or Cancel

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark a comment for test step

Keyword.Name: QueryDBAndStoreResultToFile
Keyword.Description: Query DB then store the table results to a file

Param.Name: sConnectString
Param.Description: provide 5 params: hostname - port - user - pass - database name need to connect - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries1
Param.Description: String query1 to combine before executing query

Param.Name: sSQLqueries2
Param.Description: String query2 to combine before executing query

Param.Name: sSQLqueries3
Param.Description: String query3 to combine before executing query

Param.Name: sSQLQueryFile
Param.Description: Execute query from file

Param.Name: sOutputResult2File
Param.Description: Solving the query result then store to a text file, split each of rows to a line, separate each of columns by " || "

Keyword.Description: Login To Webmail (Images\WebMail\Login\2.png)

Param.Name: sUserName
Param.Description: User Name

Keyword.Name: CheckEmail365UserCreationResetPassword
Keyword.Description: Check Email in Inbox, Verify Email exist or not in Inbox base on From and Title, then verify content of that email (Images\WebMail\Home\3.png)

Param.Name: sFrom
Param.Description: Email From need to verify by exactly, null means by pass verify by From

Param.Name: sTitle
Param.Description: Title of Email need to confirmed, null means by pass verify Title

Param.Name: sExpectedNumberOfEmail
Param.Description: Expected number of email found base on inputted sFrom and sTitle, support compare >, null by pass verify it

Param.Name: sOpenEmailNumber
Param.Description: Click on email number found base on sFrom and sTitle, null means by pass open email

Param.Name: sContent1
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sContent2
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sResetLink
Param.Description: This is hyperlink for resetpasword, just give the prefix included Env's URL

Param.Name: sIsClick
Param.Description: If you want to click to reset Link

Param.Name: sExpectedWelcomeMessage
Param.Description: Welcome Message need to Validate

Param.Name: isClickLetBegin
Param.Description: If you want to process with Let Begin button then set it [True]

Param.Name: sEnrollmentType
Param.Description: The Type of Enrollment you want to do Enroll

Param.Name: sPrimaryEmail
Param.Description: The Primary Email you want to use for enrollment

Param.Name: sOptionalEmail
Param.Description: The Optional Email you want to use for enrollment,Separate optional e-mails with semi-colon

Param.Name: sBankName
Param.Description: The Name of Bank you want to setup with ACH Information

Param.Name: sAccountType
Param.Description: The Type of account ACH

Param.Name: sRoutingNumber
Param.Description: Routing Number, Must be 9 digits

Param.Name: sAccountNumber
Param.Description: Account Number, less than 17 digits

Param.Name: isEditCompanyInfor
Param.Description: If you want to Edit Company Information then set it [true], othewise is [false] or [null]

Param.Name: isUsingSameMainAddress
Param.Description: If you want Remit Address using same adresss as Main Address then set it [true], othewise is [false] or [null]

Param.Name: sMainAddressMetaData
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill Address Information, must be 10 values and separate by semicolon [;] MainCountry;AddressLine1;AddresssLine2;AddresssLine3;City;State/Provice;Zipcode;ContactName;ContactTitle;ContactEmail

Param.Name: sMainPhone
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill sMainPhone Information, must be 3 values and separate by semicolon [;] CountryCode;PhoneNumber;Extension

Param.Name: sRemitAddressMetaData
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill Address Information, must be 10 values and separate by semicolon [;] MainCountry;AddressLine1;AddresssLine2;AddresssLine3;City;State/Provice;Zipcode;ContactName;ContactTitle;ContactEmail

Param.Name: sRemitPhone
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill sMainPhone Information, must be 3 values and separate by semicolon [;] CountryCode;PhoneNumber;Extension

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: Nothing here

Param.Description: Vendor Name or Vendor Number that will be inputed to search field

Param.Description: Enrollment Type need to change or Resend for Resend Enrollment

Param.Name: sIsSendMail
Param.Description: If you want to Send Email, set to True, False for Cancel or null for bypasss

Param.Name: sEmailToSend
Param.Description: The Email you want to send Enrollment to. null for bypasss

Param.Name: sExpectedToastMessage
Param.Description: The message you want to validate

Param.Name: isReset
Param.Description: If you want to Reset Enrollment then set to True

Param.Name: sExpectedEnrolledStatus
Param.Description: Expected Enrollment status need to validate

Param.Description: If you want to Save the change then put Save, Apply or Cancel

Keyword.Description: Login To Webmail (Images\WebMail\Login\2.png)

Param.Name: sUserName
Param.Description: User Name

Keyword.Name: CheckEmail365UserCreationResetPassword
Keyword.Description: Check Email in Inbox, Verify Email exist or not in Inbox base on From and Title, then verify content of that email (Images\WebMail\Home\3.png)

Param.Name: sFrom
Param.Description: Email From need to verify by exactly, null means by pass verify by From

Param.Name: sTitle
Param.Description: Title of Email need to confirmed, null means by pass verify Title

Param.Name: sExpectedNumberOfEmail
Param.Description: Expected number of email found base on inputted sFrom and sTitle, support compare >, null by pass verify it

Param.Name: sOpenEmailNumber
Param.Description: Click on email number found base on sFrom and sTitle, null means by pass open email

Param.Name: sContent1
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sContent2
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sResetLink
Param.Description: This is hyperlink for resetpasword, just give the prefix included Env's URL

Param.Name: sIsClick
Param.Description: If you want to click to reset Link

Param.Name: sExpectedWelcomeMessage
Param.Description: Welcome Message need to Validate

Param.Name: isClickLetBegin
Param.Description: If you want to process with Let Begin button then set it [True]

Param.Name: sEnrollmentType
Param.Description: The Type of Enrollment you want to do Enroll

Param.Name: sPrimaryEmail
Param.Description: The Primary Email you want to use for enrollment

Param.Name: sOptionalEmail
Param.Description: The Optional Email you want to use for enrollment,Separate optional e-mails with semi-colon

Param.Name: sBankName
Param.Description: The Name of Bank you want to setup with ACH Information

Param.Name: sAccountType
Param.Description: The Type of account ACH

Param.Name: sRoutingNumber
Param.Description: Routing Number, Must be 9 digits

Param.Name: sAccountNumber
Param.Description: Account Number, less than 17 digits

Param.Name: isEditCompanyInfor
Param.Description: If you want to Edit Company Information then set it [true], otherwise is [false] or [null]

Param.Name: isUsingSameMainAddress
Param.Description: If you want Remit Address using same address as Main Address then set it [true], otherwise is [false] or [null]

Param.Name: sMainAddressMetaData
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill Address Information, must be 10 values and separate by semicolon [;] MainCountry;AddressLine1;AddresssLine2;AddresssLine3;City;State/Provice;Zipcode;ContactName;ContactTitle;ContactEmail

Param.Name: sMainPhone
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill sMainPhone Information, must be 3 values and separate by semicolon [;] CountryCode;PhoneNumber;Extension

Param.Name: sRemitAddressMetaData
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill Address Information, must be 10 values and separate by semicolon [;] MainCountry;AddressLine1;AddresssLine2;AddresssLine3;City;State/Provice;Zipcode;ContactName;ContactTitle;ContactEmail

Param.Name: sRemitPhone
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill sMainPhone Information, must be 3 values and separate by semicolon [;] CountryCode;PhoneNumber;Extension

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: Nothing here

Param.Description: Customer Name need to work with Vendor

Param.Name: sEditVendor
Param.Description: Vendor Name or Vendor Number that will be inputed to search field

Param.Name: sEnrollmentType
Param.Description: Enrollment Type need to change or Resend for Resend Enrollment

Param.Name: sIsSendMail
Param.Description: If you want to Send Email, set to True, False for Cancel or null for bypasss

Param.Name: sEmailToSend
Param.Description: The Email you want to send Enrollment to. null for bypasss

Param.Name: sExpectedToastMessage
Param.Description: The message you want to validate

Param.Name: isReset
Param.Description: If you want to Reset Enrollment then set to True

Param.Name: sExpectedEnrolledStatus
Param.Description: Expected Enrollment status need to validate

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: If you want to Save the change then put Save, Apply or Cancel

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Name: CheckEmail365UserCreationResetPassword
Keyword.Description: Check Email in Inbox, Verify Email exist or not in Inbox base on From and Title, then verify content of that email (Images\WebMail\Home\3.png)

Param.Name: sFrom
Param.Description: Email From need to verify by exactly, null means by pass verify by From

Param.Name: sTitle
Param.Description: Title of Email need to confirmed, null means by pass verify Title

Param.Name: sExpectedNumberOfEmail
Param.Description: Expected number of email found base on inputted sFrom and sTitle, support compare >, null by pass verify it

Param.Name: sOpenEmailNumber
Param.Description: Click on email number found base on sFrom and sTitle, null means by pass open email

Param.Name: sContent1
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sContent2
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sResetLink
Param.Description: This is hyperlink for resetpasword, just give the prefix included Env's URL

Param.Name: sIsClick
Param.Description: If you want to click to reset Link

Param.Name: sExpectedWelcomeMessage
Param.Description: Welcome Message need to Validate

Param.Name: isClickLetBegin
Param.Description: If you want to process with Let Begin button then set it [True]

Param.Name: sEnrollmentType
Param.Description: The Type of Enrollment you want to do Enroll

Param.Name: sPrimaryEmail
Param.Description: The Primary Email you want to use for enrollment

Param.Name: sOptionalEmail
Param.Description: The Optional Email you want to use for enrollment,Separate optional e-mails with semi-colon

Param.Name: sBankName
Param.Description: The Name of Bank you want to setup with ACH Information

Param.Name: sAccountType
Param.Description: The Type of account ACH

Param.Name: sRoutingNumber
Param.Description: Routing Number, Must be 9 digits

Param.Name: sAccountNumber
Param.Description: Account Number, less than 17 digits

Param.Name: isEditCompanyInfor
Param.Description: If you want to Edit Company Information then set it [true], otherwise is [false] or [null]

Param.Name: isUsingSameMainAddress
Param.Description: If you want Remit Address using same address as Main Address then set it [true], otherwise is [false] or [null]

Param.Name: sMainAddressMetaData
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill Address Information, must be 10 values and separate by semicolon [;] MainCountry;AddressLine1;AddresssLine2;AddresssLine3;City;State/Provice;Zipcode;ContactName;ContactTitle;ContactEmail

Param.Name: sMainPhone
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill sMainPhone Information, must be 3 values and separate by semicolon [;] CountryCode;PhoneNumber;Extension

Param.Name: sRemitAddressMetaData
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill Address Information, must be 10 values and separate by semicolon [;] MainCountry;AddressLine1;AddresssLine2;AddresssLine3;City;State/Provice;Zipcode;ContactName;ContactTitle;ContactEmail

Param.Name: sRemitPhone
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill sMainPhone Information, must be 3 values and separate by semicolon [;] CountryCode;PhoneNumber;Extension

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: Nothing here

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Name: VCOEnrollmentSendEmail
Keyword.Description: VCO Enrollment Process(Images\AdminDev\Operations\1.png)

Param.Name: sCustomerName
Param.Description: Customer Name need to work with Vendor

Param.Name: sEditVendor
Param.Description: Vendor Name or Vendor Number that will be inputed to search field

Param.Name: sEnrollmentType
Param.Description: Enrollment Type need to change or Resend for Resend Enrollment

Param.Name: sIsSendMail
Param.Description: If you want to Send Email, set to True, False for Cancel or null for bypasss

Param.Name: sEmailToSend
Param.Description: The Email you want to send Enrollment to. null for bypasss

Param.Name: sExpectedToastMessage
Param.Description: The message you want to validate

Param.Name: isReset
Param.Description: If you want to Reset Enrollment then set to True

Param.Name: sExpectedEnrolledStatus
Param.Description: Expected Enrollment status need to validate

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: If you want to Save the change then put Save, Apply or Cancel

Keyword.Description: Check Email in Inbox, Verify Email exist or not in Inbox base on From and Title, then verify content of that email (Images\WebMail\Home\3.png)

Param.Name: sFrom
Param.Description: Email From need to verify by exactly, null means by pass verify by From

Param.Name: sTitle
Param.Description: Title of Email need to confirmed, null means by pass verify Title

Param.Name: sExpectedNumberOfEmail
Param.Description: Expected number of email found base on inputted sFrom and sTitle, support compare >, null by pass verify it

Param.Name: sOpenEmailNumber
Param.Description: Click on email number found base on sFrom and sTitle, null means by pass open email

Param.Name: sContent1
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sContent2
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sResetLink
Param.Description: This is hyperlink for resetpasword, just give the prefix included Env's URL

Param.Name: sIsClick
Param.Description: If you want to click to reset Link

Param.Description: Enrollment Type need to change or Resend for Resend Enrollment

Param.Description: If you want to Send Email, set to True, False for Cancel or null for bypasss

Param.Description: The Email you want to send Enrollment to. null for bypasss

Param.Description: The message you want to validate

Param.Name: isReset
Param.Description: If you want to Reset Enrollment then set to True

Param.Name: sExpectedEnrolledStatus
Param.Description: Expected Enrollment status need to validate

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: If you want to Save the change then put Save, Apply or Cancel

Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Description: Check Email in Inbox, Verify Email exist or not in Inbox base on From and Title, then verify content of that email (Images\WebMail\Home\3.png)

Param.Name: sFrom
Param.Description: Email From need to verify by exactly, null means by pass verify by From

Param.Name: sTitle
Param.Description: Title of Email need to confirmed, null means by pass verify Title

Param.Name: sExpectedNumberOfEmail
Param.Description: Expected number of email found base on inputted sFrom and sTitle, support compare >, null by pass verify it

Param.Name: sOpenEmailNumber
Param.Description: Click on email number found base on sFrom and sTitle, null means by pass open email

Param.Name: sContent1
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sContent2
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sResetLink
Param.Description: This is hyperlink for resetpasword, just give the prefix included Env's URL

Param.Name: sIsClick
Param.Description: If you want to click to reset Link

Param.Name: sExpectedWelcomeMessage
Param.Description: Welcome Message need to Validate

Param.Name: isClickLetBegin
Param.Description: If you want to process with Let Begin button then set it [True]

Param.Name: sEnrollmentType
Param.Description: The Type of Enrollment you want to do Enroll

Param.Name: sPrimaryEmail
Param.Description: The Primary Email you want to use for enrollment

Param.Name: sOptionalEmail
Param.Description: The Optional Email you want to use for enrollment,Separate optional e-mails with semi-colon

Param.Name: sBankName
Param.Description: The Name of Bank you want to setup with ACH Information

Param.Name: sAccountType
Param.Description: The Type of account ACH

Param.Name: sRoutingNumber
Param.Description: Routing Number, Must be 9 digits

Param.Name: sAccountNumber
Param.Description: Account Number, less than 17 digits

Param.Name: isEditCompanyInfor
Param.Description: If you want to Edit Company Information then set it [true], othewise is [false] or [null]

Param.Name: isUsingSameMainAddress
Param.Description: If you want Remit Address using same adresss as Main Address then set it [true], othewise is [false] or [null]

Param.Name: sMainAddressMetaData
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill Address Information, must be 10 values and separate by semicolon [;] MainCountry;AddressLine1;AddresssLine2;AddresssLine3;City;State/Provice;Zipcode;ContactName;ContactTitle;ContactEmail

Param.Name: sMainPhone
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill sMainPhone Information, must be 3 values and separate by semicolon [;] CountryCode;PhoneNumber;Extension

Param.Name: sRemitAddressMetaData
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill Address Information, must be 10 values and separate by semicolon [;] MainCountry;AddressLine1;AddresssLine2;AddresssLine3;City;State/Provice;Zipcode;ContactName;ContactTitle;ContactEmail

Param.Name: sRemitPhone
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill sMainPhone Information, must be 3 values and separate by semicolon [;] CountryCode;PhoneNumber;Extension

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: Nothing here

Keyword.Description: Login To Webmail (Images\WebMail\Login\2.png)

Param.Name: sUserName
Param.Description: User Name

Keyword.Name: CheckEmail365UserCreationResetPassword
Keyword.Description: Check Email in Inbox, Verify Email exist or not in Inbox base on From and Title, then verify content of that email (Images\WebMail\Home\3.png)

Param.Name: sFrom
Param.Description: Email From need to verify by exactly, null means by pass verify by From

Param.Name: sTitle
Param.Description: Title of Email need to confirmed, null means by pass verify Title

Param.Name: sExpectedNumberOfEmail
Param.Description: Expected number of email found base on inputted sFrom and sTitle, support compare >, null by pass verify it

Param.Name: sOpenEmailNumber
Param.Description: Click on email number found base on sFrom and sTitle, null means by pass open email

Param.Name: sContent1
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sContent2
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sResetLink
Param.Description: This is hyperlink for resetpasword, just give the prefix included Env's URL

Param.Name: sIsClick
Param.Description: If you want to click to reset Link

Param.Name: sExpectedWelcomeMessage
Param.Description: Welcome Message need to Validate

Param.Name: isClickLetBegin
Param.Description: If you want to process with Let Begin button then set it [True]

Param.Name: sEnrollmentType
Param.Description: The Type of Enrollment you want to do Enroll

Param.Name: sPrimaryEmail
Param.Description: The Primary Email you want to use for enrollment

Param.Name: sOptionalEmail
Param.Description: The Optional Email you want to use for enrollment,Separate optional e-mails with semi-colon

Param.Name: sBankName
Param.Description: The Name of Bank you want to setup with ACH Information

Param.Name: sAccountType
Param.Description: The Type of account ACH

Param.Name: sRoutingNumber
Param.Description: Routing Number, Must be 9 digits

Param.Name: sAccountNumber
Param.Description: Account Number, less than 17 digits

Param.Name: isEditCompanyInfor
Param.Description: If you want to Edit Company Information then set it [true], otherwise is [false] or [null]

Param.Name: isUsingSameMainAddress
Param.Description: If you want Remit Address using same address as Main Address then set it [true], otherwise is [false] or [null]

Param.Name: sMainAddressMetaData
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill Address Information, must be 10 values and separate by semicolon [;] MainCountry;AddressLine1;AddresssLine2;AddresssLine3;City;State/Provice;Zipcode;ContactName;ContactTitle;ContactEmail

Param.Name: sMainPhone
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill sMainPhone Information, must be 3 values and separate by semicolon [;] CountryCode;PhoneNumber;Extension

Param.Name: sRemitAddressMetaData

Keyword.Description: Check Email in Inbox, Verify Email exist or not in Inbox base on From and Title, then verify content of that email (Images\WebMail\Home\3.png)

Param.Name: sFrom
Param.Description: Email From need to verify by exactly, null means by pass verify by From

Param.Name: sTitle
Param.Description: Title of Email need to confirmed, null means by pass verify Title

Param.Name: sExpectedNumberOfEmail
Param.Description: Expected number of email found base on inputted sFrom and sTitle, support compare >, null by pass verify it

Param.Name: sOpenEmailNumber
Param.Description: Click on email number found base on sFrom and sTitle, null means by pass open email

Param.Name: sContent1
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sContent2
Param.Description: Content of Opened Email, Just give the keyword need to verify, don't put all things heare, null means by pass verify content

Param.Name: sResetLink
Param.Description: This is hyperlink for resetpasword, just give the prefix included Env's URL

Param.Name: sIsClick
Param.Description: If you want to click to reset Link

Param.Name: sExpectedWelcomeMessage
Param.Description: Welcome Message need to Validate

Param.Name: isClickLetBegin
Param.Description: If you want to process with Let Begin button then set it [True]

Param.Name: sEnrollmentType
Param.Description: The Type of Enrollment you want to do Enroll

Param.Name: sPrimaryEmail
Param.Description: The Primary Email you want to use for enrollment

Param.Name: sOptionalEmail
Param.Description: The Optional Email you want to use for enrollment,Separate optional e-mails with semi-colon

Param.Name: sBankName
Param.Description: The Name of Bank you want to setup with ACH Information

Param.Name: sAccountType
Param.Description: The Type of account ACH

Param.Name: sRoutingNumber
Param.Description: Routing Number, Must be 9 digits

Param.Name: sAccountNumber
Param.Description: Account Number, less than 17 digits

Param.Name: isEditCompanyInfor
Param.Description: If you want to Edit Company Information then set it [true], otherwise is [false] or [null]

Param.Name: isUsingSameMainAddress
Param.Description: If you want Remit Address using same address as Main Address then set it [true], otherwise is [false] or [null]

Param.Name: sMainAddressMetaData
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill Address Information, must be 10 values and separate by semicolon [;] MainCountry;AddressLine1;AddresssLine2;AddresssLine3;City;State/Provice;Zipcode;ContactName;ContactTitle;ContactEmail

Param.Name: sMainPhone

Param.Name: sRemitPhone
Param.Description: MetaData in order to fulfill sMainPhone Information, must be 3 values and separate by semicolon [;] CountryCode;PhoneNumber;Extension

Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second
